'''Mysterious Stone Slate (I)''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained from an [[Chest|Exquisite Chest]] found in [[The Sands of Three Canals]]. The chest will only be obtainable after having completed the {{Quest|"The Falcon's Hunt"}}.

It and the other mysterious slates are used to complete the [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] ''[[The Murals of Gurabad]]''.
